d: Paco are casual yet stylish summer pants.

s.cutCuff.d: The **Cuff** (4) is a rectangular piece of lining {{{ w }}} wide and {{{ l }}} long.
s.cutWaistband.d: The **Waistband** (3) is a rectangular piece of lining {{{ w }}} wide and {{{ l }}} long.
s.cutBackPocketBag.t: The back pocket bag is not shown
s.cutBackPocketBag.d: The **Back pocket bag** (6) is a rectangular piece of lining {{{ w }}} wide and {{{ l }}} long.
s.cutBackPocketWelt.t: The back pocket welt is not shown
s.cutBackPocketWelt.d: The **Back pocket welt** (7) is a rectangular piece of lining {{{ w }}} wide and {{{ l }}} long.
s.cutBackPocketWeltInterfacing.t: The back pocket welt interfacing is not shown
s.cutBackPocketWeltInterfacing.d: The **Back pocket welt interfacing** (8) is a rectangular piece of fusible interfacing {{{ w }}} wide and {{{ l }}} long.

heelEase.d: The amount of ease at your heel (when stepping into the leg)

frontPockets.d: Whether or not to add front pockets on the side seam

frontPocketsNo.d: Draft a pattern without front pockets

frontPocketsYes.d: Draft a pattern with front pockets

frontPocketFlapSize.d: This option controls the front pocket flap size, but it is not exposed to the UI

backPockets.d: Whether or not to add welt pockets to the back

backPocketsNo.d: Draft a pattern without back pockets

backPocketsYes.d: Draft a pattern with back pockets

elasticatedCuff.d: Whether you want to include an elasticated cuff at the legs, or prefer a classic hemmed finish

elasticatedCuffNo.d: Draft a pattern without elasticated cuffs

elasticatedCuffYes.d: Draft a pattern with a elasticated cuffs

ankleElastic.d: Width of the (optional) elastic at the ankle/hem
